name: Firmware Infirmary - Beta
description:
Beta build of Firmware Infirmary! Updated environment, full narrative implementation, fail states, 4 microgames, 6 characters.

  • Controls:
    • Forward - W
    • Left - A
    • Backward - S
    • Right - D
    • Select: Left Click
      • To further explain, select is used to click on interactables. (I.e. buttons) 
    •  Menu: ESC for all menus. 
      • Can Change mouse sensitivity in video settings. 
    •  Dialogue: Respond via clicking on a red-text option
